item_category: Xperia L4 - Supercharge your work force - Beautiful design that fits comfortably in the hand with true Sony minimalistic design. 6.2" 21:9 HD+ LCD Large display allowing you to see more and work smarter. 3GB RAM & 64GB internal memory so you have all the storage you need and excellent multi-tasking performance. Zero Touch compatible - Seamless set up and deployment of corporate-owned devices. Power throughout the day with a long-lasting high-capacity 3,580mAh battery for all-day use.

review_text: I bought this to replace my failing 5yr old Sony Mobile and have been delighted so far. It takes great pics, the screen resolution is superb, works very quick, nice size memory, and is built really well. A great phone at a great price !
Bought for wife ,she loves it says it so easy to use
I bought this phone a month ago
I am very pleased with this phone. Is moving fast and has a great battery.
This is not a bad phone for the price, but isn't a patch on other xperia's I've owned. It can be a little laggy as well as being glitchy.
I bought this couple weeks ago, and i really happy about it. I really recommended

This was bought to replace an LG which lasted for years this Sony Xperia L4 most definitely didn't disappoint battery lasts for about five days without recharge (after initial 12 hours which all Android have) it has a brilliant camera and photos can be edited. Ringtones and message are good quality and loud alarm is great . It definitely hasn't disappointed but better than expected
Am so happy about it
Great product, would recommend
Great had for 6weeks no problems with the phone at all
I bought this over a week ago and this is a great phone for the price.
Needed a new phone as mine had broken, great phone, can't fault nothing with it, don't normally go for Sony normally have Samsung but thought I'd have a change glad I did
Took a bit of getting used to as I've lost a couple of important emails but on the whole very pleased as it has 75 percent more memory
Very nice mobil. Is so fine
Total waste of money. Customers are not made aware thst you must have wifi to set the phone up.
This phone looks great and more expensive than it was. It has a good size screen and was easy to set up.  I would definitely recommend it.
Great phone and excellent price. Purchased when it was on offer. Easy enough to get a case for it online. Nice display and good graphics.  Very happy with this purchase.
Brilliant budget phone with a good front camera and a mediocre back camera
Looks good,does everything I need in a phone
fantastic product, I recommend good price
Lovely very pleased with my purchase

This is a perfect phone for me, not too expensive,. I personally have 2, 1 for work (blue) and 1 for personal use (black)
Does exactly what I would expect of a smart phone.
Sleek and stylish
Bought as I had my wife’s old iPhone and couldn’t get on with it. Always had Sony in the past and love having it back. I’m 63 and find it more manageable.

Does everything I can think of and it's pretty fast too. With a great camera and 64gb storage you may not even need an SD card!  and together with the Sony sound my tracks at 320kbs sound superb. Can't be beaten for the price IMO
Happy with purchase, but won't be using myself. The person I bought it for is going to replace the old phone of the same make. They are more than happy with my purchase.
Easy delivery and good product
The phone is amazing.i love it
I bought this phone for my daughter as her first phone. Took her no time to learn to use it. Very good product for very good price.
The only issue battery is not last long
My son love it, got it for him as a present.

Purchased the SIM Free Sony Xperia L4 as I already have a SIM only contract.
Great signal, battery life and features at a very reasonable price.
Excellent same day delivery.
Would definitely recommend.

Bought for my son to replace his xperia l1. 
He is delighted with the camera, video, processor etc. Well worth the money.
It worth buying it for the price of it. This is the best phone out there for that price
Great phone easy to use
Decent phone for the price
Bought this as a replacement for my old phone, really happy with it, battery lasts for a few days before needing charged, was easy to set up.
good value functional phone
Perfect stuff, Ill recommend to all

The price was considerable and good for the product u get. I'm normally happy with Sony products because they are normally really good but cheap at the same time. One thing to maybe note is that if you don't like phones that have a shorter width then u probably wouldn't like this one because it has a short width. But overall km happy with the product.
great little phone great price.

Very good
my partner now has a sony 
Very easy to use 
Battery keeps very well in the day 
Over all very happy 
And its a very  good price
Easy to set up and use and synch with other devices
Good price and great service in these troubled times.
All our family has one. Doesn't cost the earth. But looks stylish and more than you spend on it. Highly recommended.
Big size and friendly users,camara quality

Click & collect from my local Sainsburys was quick and simple. Overall it's a good phone. My previous phone was an Xperia, so exporting and importing was simple. All contacts, photos etc easily transferred. My only negative is the font size. The "largest" font is the same as "medium" on my previous Xperia.
Great phone and good quality good price thanks
Brilliant service and fast delivery, would definitely recommend Argos
a very nice phone got this as we had an older model  . even though  its the same make lots of changers .. we will just have to get used to it . it was easy to transfer  dater
Fantastic phone for the price
This is a very good phone for the price I paid. Does everything that you need it to.
My  mobile was very easy to used download settings text take photos etc

Just what I wanted a good cheap phone.
Takes great pictures as well.
Staff was very helpful when I went to pick it up from the store
I had £30 off this phone and it was a really good buy now. So easy to use!

Brilliant phone 
Fast 
Works really well 
Good amount of storage

I am really pleased with my purchase now it is set up but as I am over 80 I would not have been able to set it up on my own. Fortunately I had someone to help me and guide me through all the queries I have had. This is where a hard copy instruction book would have been helpful. Some of my teething problems were not covered in the online instructions.

its a sleek design the black one i purchased is a good looking phone, it has plenty rooms for apps , my online banking, facebook, twitter, its fast , only thing i dont like is the sound from a sony i was not good its tinny, but its a budget phone you can always purchase a speaker, the phones contact is rubbish design its hard to navigate it can be confusing. I bouught the phone as i despartely needed one, so im happy with it. plenty storage, good price, fast.
Just as hoped for and expected

Great phone.
Has all the android apps 
Wide screen 
Can add SD card 
From a name I trust Sony

I always used to buy the top tier Sony mobiles on contract, this phone is a good replacement for my ageing Sony Xperia xz premium. Phones do not last forever, no point I realise now buying flagship phones when a phones only as good as the non removable battery in it. Now I bought this outright and for the price it's simply the best on the market, accepted planned obselecance buying cheaper throwaways is how it is now. A new battery cost more than my old phone was worth so I bought this!
Overall, bought as a present and not having any problems at the moment. Person already using the phone without having any problems.

This phone was a sim free self upgrade and I would highly recommend it
Excellent value !!!
I bought this phone for a friend, as I have one. It is really easy to use and understand.
Won't set up messaging going to return it as soon as I can just rubbish
Was an upgrade was easy to set up and use happy with all the functions camera excellent really the easy to use even for me
Really good phone easy to handle when you get to grips with it but could come with better instructions
This phone is excellent, I ordered 10 pm Friday and arrived following day by 11 am.
At this price just a fantastic phone thank you

Phone looks nice and screen size right for me. Not heavy and fits in one hand. Features alright and easy to navigate. So far it does the job, the only thing is I find the screen very dark. Overall I’ll recommend it !
Xperia as always is a great reliable phone easy to set up and transfer stored pics contacts etc
Absolutely brilliant, I would buy again
Surprisingly fast, excellent design , and user friendly. Good camera , storage, and a very reasonable price. Chosen for sony s reliability and build quality.

Very pleased with this Sony Xperia L4. It replaced my old Xperia L1 who was at its end of life. The transfer of data was a breeze. The battery lasts much longer with this new phone - it was a very good surprise. Recommended.
I am in love with this Sony Xperia L4 . My favourite phone. Easy to access and camera is super nice beautiful pictures. I love it
Bought ti replace a Samsung S9 and its a big improvement! Great phone , big screen , comfortable in the hand runs all my apps quickly battery is amazing.
A great phone. Pay hundreds more for a galaxy and it's no better than this
Nice  smallish  phone

Well made phone, for the price.
Only problem is that it won't get the android 10 update.
Overall everything is good. It was present for my husband. He wasn't complain about phone jet, so he is happy.
This phone is for my daughter, she said it's very good for games, nice size, not heavy, easy to use and very clear screen.
I would recommend this to a friend
My new phone is super awesome it is very fast and worth every penny great product
Very easy to set up and has s good battery life.
OKs good and she found it very easy to use. I would recommend this product to anybody.

Value for money and has all features i hoped to see on a smartphone.
Have used Sony Xperia before and pleased i selected this model.
Phone does more than I expected
Bought this to replace older version of Xperia phone. This has more space and many more apps. Latest Security apps on phone. Delighted with my purchase
I love the features of the phone and benefits it provides and would highly recommend it. The fact that it comes in Black and Blue - choice of colours.

This phone is fast, battery lasts all day, even if you're playing a game or on social media for a large portion of the day, at 9pm the battery will still be at  around 40-50%, which is very impressive as my old phone would be at 10-15% by 9pm.

The phone is exactly how you'd expect a flagship Xperia to work, its quick and I.dont find the screen that dull considering the bad reviews its had about brightness. There was no issue collecting from store.

needed a upgrade as my trusty XA2 was on its way out, good looking phone well packed with the apps and specs needed, got used to the additional length this phone provides quickly and still fits in jeans pocket.
Had to wait for stock to come in Sony L4's seem to be popular. The phones as I expected well made a reasonable size and price. I'm hoping it will provide good service as previous Sony phones have.
Great value, great upgrade from my L3, and able to pick up the next day covid safe!

Once you get over the gaudiness of the screen size it's actually a very good phone, you might have a couple issues with resolutions and full screens on some websites but mostly a good match for just about anyone.
While the screen is large the bezel is very small so it works out to be of a comfortable size
Really pleased, looks nice and is easy to use.
A good phone not the fastest one about but if you want a good smartphone without paying £1000+ then you won't be disappointed
For some reason the fingerprint doesn't work also there isn't even a setting for this ?
Phone is a great basic option for a new phone. Capable of holding mutipul apps, it has a good screen and picture quality, camera is also pretty good,everything that is needed for a reasonable price.
Easy to use, nice size phone. Wish I had bought sooner.
Fast working, nice to hold and looks smart. Really happy and would recommend it 10/10

Got this new mobile for my wife she not too impressed unfortunately as it's very smooth on the back so it's a bit slippy and easy to drop and we had fantastic home WiFi and everything in the house connect's but this phone is not great always losing connection so not too great wouldn't buy again may have to return

I purchased this phone as my Sony phone was getting a bit old. I found it easy to set up, transferring content from old phone to new was easy. Easy to use and battery life is better than my older phone. Would recommend.
I expected better than I have got it.
Is good phone where you can’t go wrong in terms of accessibility and having photo it does what exactly what it said.

Bought this for my young daughter as her first phone as I did not want to break the bank on other more expensive phones and it’s perfect with a great battery, large screen and looks amazing. My daughter loves it as it’s just the same as more expensive phones and with the offer Argos you could not go wrong.
Will absolutely recommend this phones. Love everything about it.
Excellent service at the store and item was in excellent condition.
It's ok for basic features little slow when moving

Bought this phone to replace a Samsung Galaxy which had given up the ghost. Phone offered same specs as a more expensive Samsung so It was a simple choice. Easy to set up and use (even for a 75 year old!!). Only problem I find, and I suppose it is the same with most new phones, I don't seem to be able to get rid of all the annoying news articles etc which keep popping up. However, it is a good phone which works very well.
Does everything and I love it

Great price, much cheaper than even eBay.

Simple process to collect despite COVID restrictions.

Argos is a rock, dependable, affordable and simple.

Definitely recommend.
This is my second Sony smart phone. The last one lasted six years. Built to last great phones
buy it is good price and good quality

Great budget phone, does everything I need and more, built in mirror cast makes casting easier than other popular brands, battery is long lasting even with apps running in the background. Screen is large enough for watching videos or playing games and the phone is just the right size for holding in my hand and fits easily into my pocket.
Can't really go wrong with Sony.
great phone for the price does everything i need it for
replaces an older Sony Xperia Z4 and this is even better. Easy to setup with good audio and camera.

I have been using Sony for the past six years but this one is not the best. I have Sony L4 phone for less than three months, plug it to charge, when I took it off the charger I realized the phone is bend. I contacted Sony but they asked me to pay for the repair costs which is not my fault. So disappointed and am not using Sony anyone.

Performance is not bad considering the price. Screen is a little narrow, hence keyboard keys are too close. Not too heavy. It won't connect to my car via Bluetooth, which is very annoying, otherwise happy with it.
Really good quality for a good price!!
Brilliant mobile for the money can't fault it

Easy to use.fast browsing and very good camera.
Good storage
All-round a very nice phone.
Great phone, it is performing well, a lot faster than the old one, would recommend
Well worth the money. Solid Phone and does the job as well as any premium phone.
This new phone is an updated version of my Sony Xperia and it looks great. Also the storage is plentiful and photos look really crisp.

From ordering online to picking up from store - hassle free, excellent customer service.
Excellent phone, far better and has more features that i first thought. the split screen is awesome!
The model is perfect to me. Great camera and battery.
it is too soon to soon to find all the does and dont's
Can't really say much of a review for this item as its for my partner for Christmas but looks nice and slim reasonable price
Very great!!!!!!!!!!
Brilliant phone well worth the money
The phone is reliable and is responsive, basically a solid smart phone for a reasnoble price. Runs all my apps.
Good smart phone available from stock and at a competitive price.

I purchased this handset for my son and have been very impressed with the performance. It has handled apps and streaming as well as high end handsets at four times the price. The handset is comfortable to hold and the screen is great for streaming. Would definitely recommend.
The phone is fantastic. Great camera highly recommend
Got 2 of these phones now for my kids. Great phone just as good as the premium brands out there but a lot cheaper.
This is an inexpensive phone, a little bit large for cargo pockets on work trousers, but overall seems a decent phone and good value.
Good product like the phone slim and good
This was fairly easy to set us from old experia. My old phone was dying.  This has pretty decent battery life and all seems good so far. Good price too considering what I paid for my old one.

Have always used Sony products and needed to upgrade my M4 Aqua mobile due to lack of memory capacity. 

Very easy to set up and use, this is a very good mobile phone and the system does not 'eat up' all the memory. Very sharp screen as you would expect for Sony.

Only downside, but not a major problem, the battery life could be a bit better. All in all a very good buy and excellent, speedy process buying via Argos.
I bought this Sony phone as a upgrade to my old iPhone but was very disappointed with it as it had a faulty so I decided to keep my old phone and sent it back to argos and got a full refund
Well worth buying 64G for extra storage.
I would definitely recommend this phone
Similar to my previous two Sony phones. Don't like the position of the on/off and volume buttons on the side. Should be higher so as not to interfere when holding
Not happy as you are advertising them as dual SIM, but I discovered after purchasing it t that it's is in fact single SIM,
Love it does everything I need it to
It's easy to transfer data, got much bigger memory than previous one but operates similarly.
Great phone, sleek lovely colour blue, easy to use would recommend.
Very stylish we'll make nice screen size good quality photos on camera good quality graphics nice and cleaner. Like the colour of the Sony L4 nice blue.
I've always had Sony Xperia phone's so just updated.I find them easy to use

Great phone slim design fits in my hand, I really like Sony phones had the Experia 1 over 3 years ,only problem I had was ,it wouldn't down load apps ,took it back to factory settings ,working perfectly, really like it , definitely recommend,

I needed a new phone quickly and chose this on the basis I very much liked my previous Sony phone.  This phone builds on what I liked and has some new software features that are good as well and its easy to find your way around.  When you first see it it seems quite big, but its easy to handle and you very soon get used to it.  Would recommend. Argos service first rate as usual.
Easy to use and good value.
Great phone for price, Sony are never a let down for me. Great storage, camera and easy to use.

Low cost price phone with good quality. Some phones out there are so expensive and have less features than this phone. I recommend if you've a low budget but want a decent phone. I do think one improvement could be the internal storage, but I was able to get a MicroSD card for this and still not have to pay even half the price of most of the phones out there currently. Camera quality I wouldn't say is as good as other phones currently but isn't significantly terrible considering the price.
Would recommend excellent quality one of the best phones iv had
Excellent phone, nice sleek design and very responsive. Phone cases are hard to find but I managed to get one from an online shopping site. A must have phone on a budget..
This phone is amazing and reliable also I'm apps tweaks to good for game, photos email too
This is a great phone ,very easy to set up and great price too. Definitely recommend it and buying it from Argos because of their great service.
Love this phone Has lots of features and looks great
Easy to use. Good value
My phone been brilliant I'am  a very happy customer
greatest ,,,,,,,,,,,,

Bought to replace an ageing Asus Zenfone running Android 4. Didn't want anything too fancy just a basic Smart Phone which would run all available apps quickly and efficiently. This fits the bill. The battery life is especially good, as is the 21:9 screen. Purchased the (in my view) much nicer blue model.

Depends on what you want out of a mobile. The camera isn't bad but If you are looking for a top spec camera then look elsewhere. As I use a good compact camera I'm not really bothered. This phone however still features the little old style multi coloured notification light which is invaluable when I'm at work . Sadly a lot of manufactures are omitting this feature. Its a slim tall phone and looks more expensive than it is esp. the blue one
Very surprised with this phone a lot better than the dearer ones
Very good quality, easy to use, only downsize is no backing case_very slippy
So happy with cwalaty, was a gift for a birthday present highly recommended
The Sony Xperia L4 is an amazing mobile phone, the battery life is also amazing my phone has lasted me 4 days before recharging I would definitely recommend this phone.
Excellent camera and price
this phone has everthink you you need cant fault it
Very happy, easy to use, good size

The phone is a great looking phone, pictures are fantastic, the battery last all day even into the next day depending on what your using the phone for its a great price and just as good as a dearer make phone
I have always liked Sony mobiles and this one has lived up to expectations. Fits well in the hand, and does everything I need to very high standard
This is a great phone. Easy to use
Great product, but Argos only stock the single sim xq-ad51, not the dual sim xa-ad52 described.
Love this easy to use and perfect for me
Makes my iPad safer to use
Great phone great value for money

I bought it to replace my previous Sony phone which stopped working.   It is very easy to operate even though it  does much more.   It is light to hold and clear to see. I am pleased I chose the blue colour, very nice.
I like the phone its a good phone good camera for taking pictures

Excellent battery life, about a week.  Love the storage, much better than my old phone.  Argos service secure and easy to collect from Store.  A local phone shop were most unhelpful so would recommend Argos first!

This product is perfect for my needs, it's easy to use, and all the actions are there with just a touch away.

And the layout of the apps is perfect. I would recommend this product to anyone

This was and upgrade to my time served Sony Xperia M2, owned for around six years. Still working quite adequately truth be told. The L4 was relatively easy to fire up and set up. The big disappointment has been the carrier signal. My area is dogged with poor signal (Virgin mobile customer) and the L4 is struggling more than the M2 was. It can only be down to the set's antenna. All in all a capable mobile but feels like a little step backwards.
Needed a replacement quickly, transfer of data and settings easy and slick Xperia to Xperia
Sony xperia is a really good phone. I had Z2 witch worked great for 4 years and now I'm glad to replace it with a new model at an excelent price
Always buy Sony Xperia but not too impressed with this latest purchase
Like being able to use the larger font so I don't have to take my glasses everytime to read it
Sleek slim design, works perfectly
I brought the phone for my son it is a lovely slim design and many great features. Would recommended this phone
I'm a fan of the Sony Xperia and wasn't disappointed with this version
